overview: The infamous World War II cat house, The Pink Flamingo, is the setting where Frances, the warm-hearted madam, caters to the sex starved servicemen. Includes nostalgia, via the sets and period music, and a stag film within the film.
tagline: In 1944 the boys went marching off to war... But the men wanted a whole lot more!!!
title: Tropic of Desire
